dt: {bc}of, relating to, or indicating {a_link|direction} in space:
{bc}suitable for detecting the direction from which radio signals come or for sending out radio signals in one direction only
{bc}operating most effectively in a particular direction
{bc}relating to direction or guidance especially of thought or effort

shortdef: of, relating to, or indicating direction in space:
suitable for detecting the direction from which radio signals come or for sending out radio signals in one direction only
operating most effectively in a particular direction
